description: Blazing-fast static site generator for React.

name: Next.js
description: Lightweight framework for static and server-rendered applications.

name: Hugo
description: Hugo is a static site generator written in Go.

name: Jekyll
description: Jekyll is a simple, blog-aware, static site generator perfect for personal, project, or organization sites.

name: Hexo
description: A fast, simple & powerful blog framework, powered by Node.js.

name: Metalsmith
description: An extremely simple, pluggable static site generator.

name: Phenomic
description: A modular website compiler.

name: Gridsome
description: Vue-powered static site generator for building CDN-ready websites for any Headless CMS, APIs or Markdown-files.

name: Nuxt.js
description: Versatile vue-based framework for server-side-rendered, static and traditional single page applications.

name: eleventy
description: A simpler static site generator transforming various template files into HTML.

name: Nift
description: A cross-platform open source website generator developed in C++ that is lightning fast and extremely powerful.

name: Contentful
description: Content infrastructure for digital teams.

name: NetlifyCMS
description: open source Git-based CMS.

name: ButterCMS
description: Headless CMS and Content API.

name: Scrivito
description: Cloud-based JavaScript CMS built for digital agencies and medium to large-sized businesses.

name: GraphCMS
description: The GraphQL Headless CMS.

name: Prismic
description: Headless API CMS for both developers and marketers.

name: Siteleaf
description: A friendly CMS for your static site.

name: DatoCMS
description: The API-based CMS your editors will love.

name: Prose
description: Prose is a content editor for GitHub designed for managing websites.

name: Tipe
description: Next Generation API-first CMS.

name: Forestry
description: Headless CMS for sites built with static site generators.

name: Coisas
description: A client-side CMS for editing GitHub Markdown (and other) files.

name: Cockpit
description: A self-hosted headless and api-driven CMS.

name: HeadlessCMS
description: A List of Content Management Systems for JAMstack Sites.

name: TakeShape
description: Headless GraphQL API CMS with 1-click deploy to Netlify.

name: Ghost
description: A headless CMS for online publications

name: Strapi
description: The open source Headless CMS Front-End Developers love.

name: Auth0
description: Single sign on and token based authentication.

name: Netlify Identity
description: Brings a full suite of authentication functionality, backed by the GoTrue API.

name: Disqus
description: Global comment system that improves discussion on websites and connects conversations across the web.

name: Facebook Comments
description: The comments plugin lets people comment on content on your site using their Facebook account.

name: Utterances
description: A lightweight comments widget built on GitHub issues. Use GitHub issues for blog comments, wiki pages and more.

name: Getform
description: Form backend platform for designers and developers. Setup your form endpoints for your static site within minutes and expand your data with Zapier integration and Webhooks support.

name: Netlify Forms
description: Built-in form handling on building time by parsing HTML files directly at deploy time.

name: StaticKit
description: Modern forms for static sites, with client libraries for React and HTML.

name: Flatmarket
description: Flatmarket is a free, open source e-commerce platform for static websites.

name: GoCommerce
description: A headless e-commerce for JAMstack sites.

name: Snipcart
description: A powerful shopping cart platform for developers.

name: Moltin
description: eCommerce API for developers.

name: Trolley
description: A shopping cart designed for the JAMstack.

name: Shopify
description: Shopify headless e-commerce solution.

name: Algolia
description: The most reliable platform for building search into your business.

name: Lunr
description: Search made simple (on frontend).

name: CloudSh
description: Powerful search with a few lines of JavaScript.

name: GraphQL
description: Query language for APIs and a runtime for fulfilling those queries with your existing data.

name: Graphcool
description: Open-source and self-hosted backend-as-a-service to develop serverless GraphQL backends.

name: FaunaDB
description: Relational NoSQL database with joins, indexes, and multi-region ACID transactions in the cloud or on-premise.

name: Zapier
description: Trigger actions connecting more than 1000 apps together.

name: DataFire
description: DataFire is an open source framework for building and integrating APIs.

name: Netlify Functions
description: Netlify lets you deploy Lambda functions without an AWS account, and with function management handled directly within Netlify.

name: Amazon Lambda
description: Lets you run code without provisioning or managing servers.

name: Azure Functions
description: Serverless compute service that enables you to run code on-demand without having to explicitly provision or manage infrastructure.

name: Azure Logic Apps
description: Simplifies building automated scalable workflows that integrate apps and data across cloud services and on-premises systems.

name: App Engine
description: Serverless application that completely abstracts away infrastructure so you focus only on code.

name: Cloud Functions
description: Serverless environment to build and connect cloud services.

name: Cloud Datastore
description: Highly-scalable NoSQL database with automatic sharding and replication.

name: Cloud Storage
description: Geo-redundant object storage for high QPS needs.

name: Cloud Pub/Sub
description: Geo-redundant real-time messaging for all message sizes and velocities.

name: Apigee
description: Enterprise API management for multi-cloud environments.

name: Endpoints
description: API management apps built on Google Cloud.

name: Cloud Dataflow
description: Serverless stream and batch data processing service.

name: BigQuery
description: Serverless data warehousing services that help you to deploy advanced cloud data warehousing solutions for your enterprise.

name: Cloud ML Engine
description: Serverless machine learning services that automatically scales built on custom Google hardware (Tensor Processing Units).

name: Serverless
description: Toolkit for deploying and operating serverless architectures.

name: Cloudinary
description: Serverless media (images/videos) management platform. Provides SDKs in every popular language and media widgets for JAMstack to make it easy to manage media, CDN, storage, transformations, and more.
